live_updates: Services are disrupted as Hydro outages are ongoing. Shaw's technicians are ready to ensure services are restored as quickly as possible once power is restored to an area.
36481.summary: Some customers in the BC Kootenay & Interior Regions are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
36481.title: Apr 18 - BC Kootenay & Interior Regions | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
